00010 GasMap::GasMap(float min_x, float max_x, float min_y, float max_y, float cell_size, float max_conc, std::string frame){
00011 
00012         this->m_min_x = min_x;
00013         this->m_max_x = max_x;
00014         this->m_min_y = min_y;
00015         this->m_max_y = max_y;
00016         this->m_cell_size = cell_size;
00017         this->m_max_conc = max_conc;
00018 
00019         this->m_rows = ceil((max_y - min_y) / cell_size);
00020         this->m_cols = ceil((max_x - min_x) / cell_size);
00021 
00022         this->m_cell_coords_y.clear();
00023         for (int i = 0; i < this->m_rows; i++){
00024                 this->m_cell_coords_y.push_back(min_y + i*cell_size);
00025         }
00026 
00027         this->m_cell_coords_x.clear();
00028         for (int i = 0; i < this->m_cols; i++){
00029                 this->m_cell_coords_x.push_back(min_x + i*cell_size);
00030         }
00031 
00032         //build the data structure
00033         this->m_map.clear();
00034         for (int j = 0; j < this->m_cols; j++){
00035                 for (int i = 0; i < this->m_rows; i++){ 
00036                         float x_center = min_x + j*cell_size + cell_size / 2;
00037                         float y_center = min_y + i*cell_size + cell_size / 2;
00038                         this->m_map.push_back(Cell(x_center,y_center,cell_size));
00039                 }
00040         }
00041 
00042         this->m_frame = frame;
00043 }

00048         return this->m_rows;

00054         return this->m_cols;

00058 //==========================================================================================================
00059 bool GasMap::CalculateNewMeasurementRow(geometry_msgs::Point start, geometry_msgs::Point end, float ppmm, std::vector<int> *idx, std::vector<float> *val){
00060         float start_x = min(start.x,end.x);
00061         float end_x = max(start.x,end.x);       
00062         vector<Intersection> intersections;
00063 
00064         float tot_l = sqrt(pow(end.x - start.x,2) + pow(end.y - start.y,2));
00065         
00066         if (tot_l == 0 || ppmm == -1){
00067                 ROS_INFO("Beam length equal to zero!");
00068                 return false;
00069         }
00070         
00071         if (start.x < m_min_x || end.x < m_min_x || start.x > m_max_x || end.x > m_max_x || start.y < m_min_y || end.y < m_min_y || start.y > m_max_y || end.y > m_max_y){
00072                 ROS_INFO("Measurement out of bounds!");
00073                 return false;
00074         }
00075 
00076         intersections.clear();  
00077 
00078         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < this->m_cell_coords_x.size() ; i++){
00079                 if (this->m_cell_coords_x[i] > start_x && m_cell_coords_x[i] < end_x){
00080                         Intersection in;
00081                         in.m_x = m_cell_coords_x[i];
00082                         in.m_t = (in.m_x - start.x)/(end.x - start.x);
00083                         in.m_y = (1 - in.m_t) * start.y + in.m_t * end.y;
00084                         
00085                         float x_cell = (in.m_x - this->m_min_x) / this->m_cell_size;
00086                         float y_cell = (in.m_y - this->m_min_y) / this->m_cell_size;                    
00087 
00088                         in.m_idx_row = floor(y_cell);
00089 
00090                         if (in.m_x > 0)
00091                                 in.m_idx_col = floor(x_cell) - 1;
00092                         else
00093                                 in.m_idx_col = floor(x_cell );
00094 
00095                         intersections.push_back(in);    
00096                 }       
00097         }
00098 
00099         float start_y = min(start.y,end.y);
00100         float end_y = max(start.y,end.y);
00101 
00102         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < this->m_cell_coords_y.size() ; i++){
00103                 if (this->m_cell_coords_y[i] > start_y && m_cell_coords_y[i] < end_y){
00104                         Intersection in;
00105                         in.m_y = m_cell_coords_y[i];
00106                         in.m_t = (in.m_y - start.y)/(end.y - start.y);
00107                         in.m_x = (1 - in.m_t) * start.x + in.m_t * end.x;
00108                         
00109                         float x_cell = (in.m_x - this->m_min_x) / this->m_cell_size;
00110                         float y_cell = (in.m_y - this->m_min_y) / this->m_cell_size;    
00111 
00112                         in.m_idx_col = floor(x_cell);           
00113 
00114                         if (in.m_y > 0)
00115                                 in.m_idx_row = floor(y_cell) - 1;
00116                         else
00117                                 in.m_idx_row = floor(y_cell);
00118 
00119                         intersections.push_back(in);    
00120                 }       
00121         }
00122 
00123         std::sort(intersections.begin(), intersections.end(), Intersection::SortIntersectionPredicate);
00124         
00125         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < intersections.size() ; i++){
00126                 float l = 0;
00127                 
00128                 if (i == 0)
00129                         l = intersections[i].m_t * tot_l;
00130                 else
00131                         l = (intersections[i].m_t - intersections[i-1].m_t) * tot_l;
00132 
00133                 idx->push_back(intersections[i].m_idx_col * this->getRows() + intersections[i].m_idx_row);
00134                 val->push_back(l);
00135         }
00136         
00137         //insert also the value in the cell containing the end of the beam
00138         float x_cell = (end.x - this->m_min_x) / this->m_cell_size;
00139         float y_cell = (end.y - this->m_min_y) / this->m_cell_size;
00140         int last_col,last_row;
00141 
00142         if (x_cell> 0)
00143                 last_col = floor(x_cell);
00144         else
00145                 last_col = ceil(x_cell);
00146 
00147         if (y_cell> 0)
00148                 last_row = floor(y_cell);
00149         else
00150                 last_row = ceil(y_cell);
00151         
00152         idx->push_back(last_col * this->getRows() + last_row);
00153 
00154         if (intersections.size() == 0)
00155                 val->push_back(tot_l);  
00156         else    
00157                 val->push_back((1 - intersections[intersections.size()-1].m_t)*tot_l);
00158         
00159         return true;
00160 }

00163 //==========================================================================================================
00164 bool GasMap::updateMap(std::vector<real_t> *new_concentrations){
00165         
00166         if (new_concentrations->size() != this->m_map.size())
00167                 return 1;
00168 
00169         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < new_concentrations->size(); i++){
00170                 float conc = new_concentrations->at(i);
00171                 unsigned char idx_r = (unsigned char)round(conc / this->m_max_conc * 64.0); 
00172                 unsigned char idx_g = (unsigned char)round(conc / this->m_max_conc * 64.0); 
00173                 unsigned char idx_b = (unsigned char)round(conc / this->m_max_conc * 64.0);
00174 
00175                 idx_r = min(idx_r,(unsigned char)63);
00176                 idx_g = min(idx_g,(unsigned char)63);
00177                 idx_b = min(idx_b,(unsigned char)63);
00178                 this->m_map[i].setColor(red[idx_r],green[idx_g],blue[idx_b]);
00179         }
00180 
00181         return 0;
00182 }

00185 //==========================================================================================================
00186 void GasMap::publish(ros::Publisher &tdlas_advertise){
00187         vector<Cell>::iterator it;
00188         visualization_msgs::MarkerArray array;
00189         int aux=0;
00190 
00191         array.markers.clear();
00192 
00193         for(it=this->m_map.begin();it!=this->m_map.end();it++ ){
00194 
00195                 visualization_msgs::Marker marker;
00196                 marker.header.frame_id = this->m_frame.c_str();
00197                 marker.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
00198                 marker.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::TRIANGLE_LIST;
00199                 marker.lifetime = ros::Duration();
00200                 marker.id=aux++;
00201 
00202                 it->publish(marker);
00203                 array.markers.push_back(marker);
00204          }
00205 
00206         tdlas_advertise.publish(array);
00207 
00208         
00209 }

00212 //==========================================================================================================
00213 void GasMap::printInfo(){
00214         printf("-------------------------------------\n");
00215         printf("Minimum x coordinate: %4.2f\n",this->m_min_x);
00216         printf("Maximum x coordinate: %4.2f\n",this->m_max_x);
00217         printf("Minimum y coordinate: %4.2f\n",this->m_min_y);
00218         printf("Maximum y coordinate: %4.2f\n",this->m_max_y);
00219         printf("Cell size: %4.2f\n",this->m_cell_size); 
00220         printf("Number of rows: %d\n",this->m_rows);    
00221         printf("Number of columns: %d\n",this->m_cols); 
00222         printf("-------------------------------------\n");
00223         printf("Cell x coordinates:\n");
00224         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < this->m_cell_coords_x.size(); i++){
00225                 printf("%4.2f\t",this->m_cell_coords_x[i]);     
00226         }
00227         printf("\nCell y coordinates:\n");
00228         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < this->m_cell_coords_y.size(); i++){
00229                 printf("%4.2f\t",this->m_cell_coords_y[i]);     
00230         }
00231         printf("\n");
00232 }
